definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: fall out, come to pass, become, be (SI:1; SI:6 [[היה]], ib:3 [[הית]]; parallel form of [[הוה]], Ar. haway, Aram [[הֲוׇא]], hwo0; v. [[הָוׇה]] supr.)—

definitions.title: I. 1. a.
definitions.body: Fall out, happen [[מֶה־הָיׇה הַדָּבָר]] 1Sa 4:16 how has the matter fallen out, (gone, turned out) ? so 2Sa 1:4; [[מֶה־הָיׇה לוֹ]] Ex 32:1, Ex 32:23 (both JE) what has happened to him? cf. 1Sa 10:12; [[מִקְרֶה הוּא הָיׇה לָנוּ]] 1Sa 6:9 a chance it is that has befallen us; also [[וַיְהִי־לוֹ כֵּן]] 2Ki 7:20 and so it happened to him, cf. [[וַׇיְהִי־כֵן]] infr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: occur, take place, come about, come to pass:—[[גְדוֹלָה הָֽיְתָה בָּעָם מַגֵּפָה]] 1Sa 4:17 a great slaughter has taken place among the people, cf. 2Sa 17:9; [[וַתְּהִי]] [[הַמִּלְחָמָה בְּיַעַר אֶפְרַיִם]] 2Sa 18:6 and the battle took place in the wood of Ephraim (on [[אפרים]] cf. Klo Dr); Jos 22:17 (P; of plague); [[תְּהִי נׇא אָלָה]] Ge 26:28 (J) let an oath take place (be taken) so Ju Jdg 21:5; cf. 2Ki 17:7 (si vera l.), Ez Eze 16:34; esp. late, 2Ch 29:36, 2Ch 32:31, Ec 1:9, Ec 1:10, Ec 3:22, Ec 8:7, Ec 10:14 etc.; oft. of fulfilment of prediction, command, expectation, etc.:—[[כֵּן הָיׇה]] Ge 41:3 (E) so it came to pass, 2Sa 13:25, [[וַיְהִי־כֵן]] Ju Jdg 6:38, 2Ki 15:12, Is 29:5, & esp. [[וַיְהִי־כֵן]] Ge 1:7, Ge 1:9, Ge 1:11, Ge 1:15, Ge 1:24, Ge 1:30 (all P) +; [[יְהִי כִדְבָרֶָךָ]] Ge 30:34 let it be as thou sayest, Zec 6:15, v. also [[לאׁ תָקוּם וְלאׁ יִהְיֶה]] Is 7:7 it shall not arise (be realized) & shall not come about, 14:34; (so oft. [[בּוֹא]] q.v.

definitions.title: 2 c,
definitions.body: p. 98 supr.)
esp. &very oft., come about, come to pass sq. substantive (subj.) cl. almost alw. + modifying (usu. temporal) cl. or phr.:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ( I ) [[וַיְהִי]] and it came to pass that, most often (c. 292 t.) foll. by (a) Impf. consec.: a. with Inf. c. [[כְּ]] temp. Ge 12:14, Ge 19:17 (both J) + 75 t. + Es 3:4 Qr (Hex chiefly J,—so alw. Gn,—& JE; P only Ex 16:10, D only De 5:20, De 31:24, Jos 5:1, Jos 9:1; 27 t. in K),—somewhat diff. is 2Ki 7:18; b. with Inf. c. [[בְּ]] Ge 4:8, Ge 11:2 (both J) + 29 t. + Es 3:4 Kt (in Hex 10 t. JE; 3 t. P, Ge 19:29, Ex 34:29, Nu 17:7; not in D); g. with [[בְּ]] sq. nom. temp. ([[יוֹם]], [[בּׂקֶר]], etc.) Ge 21:22 (E) Ge 26:32 (J) + 45 t. (Hes 14 t. JE; 3 t. P, Ex 6:28, Ex 16:13, Nu 7:1; not D); d. [[לְ]] temp. 1Sa 1:20, 2Sa 13:23, 1Ki 20:26, 1Ch 20:1; e. [[כְּ]] temp. Ge 39:11, 1Sa 25:38; z. [[מִן]] temp. viz.: [[מֵאָז]] Ge 39:5, [[מִיּוֹם]] 1Sa 7:2 cf. 1Sa 30:25, [[מִיׇּמִים]] Ju Jdg 11:4, Jdg 15:1, [[מִקֵּץ]] Ge 4:3, Ge 8:6 + 6 t., [[מִקְחֵה]] Jos 3:2, 2Ki 8:3, Ez Eze 3:16, esp. [[מִמָּחֳרָת]] Ge 19:34, Ex 18:13 + 11 t.; h. [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] temp. Ge 12:11 (J) Ge 20:13 (E) + 31 t. (Hex 13 t. JE, De 2:16, not P), characteristic of Neh.'s memoris, † Ne 3:33, Ne 4:1, Ne 4:6, Ne 4:9, Ne 6:1, Ne 6:16, Ne 7:1, Ne 13:19; q. with [[כִּי]] temp. Ge 6:1 (J) Ex 3:21 (E) + 14 t. + Ju Jdg 16:25 Kt; i. [[אַחֲרֵי]] temp. Ge 22:20 (J) + 13 t., [[אַחַר]] Ge 39:7, Job 42:7, [[אַחֲרֵי־כֵן]] Ju Jdg 16:14 + 6 t.; k. sq. [[עַד]] temp. 1Sa 14:19 (on which cf. Dr); comp. [[עַד־כּׂה וְעַד־כּׂה]] 1Ki 18:45; l. with combinations; as [[בְּ]] c. nom. temp. + [[בְּ]] Inf. Ge 34:25 Ex 19:16, 1Sa 25:37; [[בְּ]] Inf. + [[כְּ]] Inf. Jos 3:14; double prep. [[כְּ מִשְּׁלשׁ חֳדָשִׁים]] Ge 38:24; [[מִקְחֵה]] + [[אַחֲרֵי אֲשֶׁר]] Jos 9:16; [[מִיׇּמִים]] + id. Jos 23:1; m. other unusual constructions under this head are: those where temporal idea is expr. by a circumst. cl. Is 22:7, 1Ki 13:20, 2Ki 8:21 (Dr:§ 165, & Obs.) = 2Ch 21:9; those with indef. [[כּׂל]] 1Sa 10:11, 2Sa 2:23, 2Sa 15:2, or with pt. = rel. cl. 1Sa 11:1 (on all v. Dr:§ 78 n. & Sm); quite unique is 1Ki 16:31, with [[הֲנׇקֵל]] ´[[לָכְתּוֹ וגו]]in place of temp. cl. (b) [[וַיְהִי]] sts. sq. simple Pf., with a negative Ge 39:10 (c. [[כְּ]] Inf.), Ex 13:17 (c. [[בְּ]] Inf.) 2Ki 12:7, 2Ki 17:25 (both c. [[בְּ]] temp.); & without neg., Ge 8:13 (P) Ge 14:1 +, usu. c. [[בְּ]] temp. (38 t.), Hex chiefly P; rarely c. other prep. & adv. as above; note esp. [[מִדֵּי]] sq. Inf. 1Sa 18:30, 2Ch 12:11; sts. the subj. of foll. Pf. precedes it c. [[וְ]], as Ge 22:1, Ge 41:1, 1Sa 18:19, 1Sa 30:1, 2Ki 2:9, 2Ki 4:40 +; note esp. 2Sa 17:27 where several subj. & also several objects precede the Pf. (cf. Dr); in these cases temporal modifier is occasionally a circumst. cl. 2Sa 13:30, 1Ki 8:10, 2Ki 19:37 = Is 37:38; rarely subj. precedes Pf. without [[וְ]] 1Ki 11:4, 1Ki 21:1, comp. subj. preceding Pt. without [[וְ]] Ne 4:10; in 2Ch 8:1 the obj. (with [[וְ]]) precedes what is appar. the principal vb. (c) [[וַיְהִי]] sq. [[וְהִנֵּה]] Ge 24:15 (J; [[טֶרְֶ]] in temp. cl.), Ge 29:25 (E), Ge 38:27 (J, both [[בְּ]] temp.) v:Ge 38:29 ([[כְּ]] Pt.), 1Sa 13:10 ([[כְּ]] Inf.); also 2Sa 1:2, 2Sa 13:36, 2Sa 15:32 (circumst. cl.) 2Ki 2:11 (id.), 2Ki 3:20, 2Ki 13:21 (circumst. cl.). (d) rarely [[וַיְהִי]] (in this sense) sq. other constructions: [[אָז יִתֵּן]] 1Ki 9:10 (c. [[מִקְחֵה]]); Impf. frequentat. 1Ki 14:28 (c. [[מִדֵּי־בּאׁ]]), 2Ki 4:8 (c. [[מִדֵּי עָבְרוֹ]]) Je 36:23 (c. [[כְּ]] Inf.); Pf. consec. frequentat. 2Ch 24:11 (c. [[בְּ]] temp.). (2) rarely also Pf. c. [[וְ]] conj. [[וְהָיׇה]] (cf. Dr:§ 183) sq. Impf. consec. as subj. cl.: 1Sa 1:12 (c. several circumst. cl.), 1Sa 10:9 (c. [[כְּ]] Inf.) 2Ki 3:15 (id.), 1Sa 17:48 (c. [[כִּי]]), Je 37:11 (c. [[בְּ]] Inf.), Am 7:2 (c. [[אִם]] temp.); also Je 3:9 (appar. c. [[מִן]] causat., but obscure); 1Sa 13:22 (c. [[בְּ]] temp.) is foll. by [[וְלאׁ]] & Pf. as well as Impf. consec.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: less oft. [[וְהָיׇה]] Pf. consec. and it shall come to pass, or frequentat., came to pass (repeatedly, etc.) usu. (a) sq. simple Impf. (c. 100 t.): a. c. [[בְּ]] temp. De 21:16, De 25:19 + 37 t., (esp. [[בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא]] Ho 2:18, Ho 2:33, Is 7:18, Is 7:21, Is 7:23 + 21 t.); b. c. [[בְּ]] loc. Ez Eze 47:23, Zec 13:8 cf. also Ho 2:1 ([[בִּמְקוֹם אֲשֶׁר]], but perh. = instead of, cf. VB); g. c. indef. rel. cl., or its equiv. ([[בּׂל]] indef., etc.), cf. Dr:§ 121, Obs. 1: Ge 4:14, Nu 17:20, De 12:11, De 18:19, Jos 7:14, Jos 7:15, Ju Jdg 7:4, 1Sa 2:36, 1Sa 17:25, 2Sa 15:35, 1Ki 19:17, 1Ki 20:6, Is 4:3, Is 24:18, Na 3:7, Je 27:8, Je 42:4, Ez Eze 47:9, Zec 14:17, Joe 3:5; d. c. [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] Nu 33:56, De 28:63, Jos 23:15, Ju Jdg 7:17, Is 29:8, Je 31:28, Zec 8:13; e. less often with other modif. phr.: [[כְּ]] Inf. Ex 33:8, Ex 33:9 (both frequentat.), Jos 3:13, Jos 8:8, Je 25:12, Je 51:63; [[בְּ]] Inf. Ge 9:14 (P) 2Ki 4:10, Ez Eze 44:17; [[אִם]] condit. De 20:11 (+ v:De 20:11 Dr:§ 118 n.), also Jos 22:18, where the arrangement is peculiar, & the condit. is expressed without [[אִם]] (cf. Dr:§ 155); [[לְ]] temp. De 23:12; [[מִקֵּץ]] Is 23:17; [[טֶרֶם]] Is 65:24; [[מִדֵּי חׂדֶשׁ בְּחָדְשׁוֹ]] Is 66:23, etc. (b) [[וְהָיׇה]] sq. Pf. consec. (c. 85 t.): a. most often + cl. c. [[כִּי]] temp. Ge 12:12, Ge 46:33 (both J) Ex 1:10 (E) De 11:29, Is 8:21 + 25 t.; b. c. [[אִם]] Ex 4:8, Ex 4:9, Nu 15:24; De 11:13 + 14 t.; also Ge 38:9, Nu 21:9 (both frequentat.); g. c. [[בְּ]] temp. Ge 30:41 (frequentat.) Ge 47:24 (but cf. Ol Di) Ex 16:5 + 11 t.; d. c. indef. rel. cl. or equivalent (Dr:§ 121 Obs. 1): Ge 24:14, Nu 10:32 (Dr:§ 118 n.) Nu 21:18, De 21:3, Ju Jdg 11:31, Jdg 19:30, Zec 14:16; e. occas. with other modif. phr.: [[כַּאֲשֶׁר]] Ge 27:40 +; [[כְּ]] Inf. Ge 44:31 +; [[בְּ]] Inf. Ex 33:22 +; [[מִקֵּץ]] 2Sa 14:26; [[עֵקֶב]] causat. De 7:12; also (c) sq. [[וְלאׁ]] + simple Impf. Ex 3:21 (c. [[כִּי]] temp.). (d) [[וְהָיׇה]] sq. Imv. (very rare) De 6:10 (c. [[כִּי]] temp.), 1Sa 10:7 (c. [[כִּי]]), cf. 1Sa 29:10, cf. Pf. consec. in command 1Sa 3:9 (c. [[אִם]]). (e) [[וְהָיׇה]] sq. simple Pf. (also very rare) De 8:19 (c. [[אִם]]). (f) [[וְהָיׇה]] sq. cl. without vb.: Ge 24:43, Jos 2:19, 1Ki 18:24 (all c. indef. rel. modifier, or equiv., v. (a) g, (b) d, supr.). (g) [[וְהָיׇה]] ([[ו]] conj.) sq. Impf. consec. v.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (e) supr.

definitions.title: II.
definitions.body: Come into being, become:—

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: abs., in lively narrative, arise, appear, come [[וַתְּהִי]] [[חְעָקָה גְדׂלָה]]Ex 12:80 (J) and there arose a great cry in Egypt; [[וַיְהִי־קוֹל]] Ez Eze 1:25 (del. Co cf. Da), Eze 37:7 (del. [[קוֹל]] LXX Co); [[כִּי הָֽיְתָה הָֽרְוׇחָה]] Ex 8:11 (J) Pharaoh saw that respite had come; Mic 7:4 now shall come their confusion (‖[[בוא]]); also of concrete objects [[וְהָֽיְתָה הַקֶּשֶׁת בֶּעָנׇן]] Ge 9:16 (P) and the bow shall appear in the clouds (‖[[וְנִרְאֲתָה]]) [[וְרִמָּה לאׁ הָֽיְתָה בּוֹ]] Ex 16:24 (P) and worms did not appear in it; of condition or action begun & continuing, as: famine Ge 12:10, Ge 26:1, Ge 26:1 (all J), Ge 41:54 (E), Ru 1:1, 2Sa 21:1, 2Ki 6:25; strife Ge 13:7, Ge 13:8 (J), Hb Hab 1:3 (‖[[מָדוֹן יִשָּׂא]]); oft. of action of the elements, as the coming of hail Ex 9:18, Ex 9:24, Ex 9:26 (all J), thunder & lighting, etc., Ex 19:16 (E), rain 1Ki 18:45, storm Jon 1:4; esp. of creative fiats [[יְהִי אוֹר וַיְהִי אוֹר]] Ge 1:3 let light appear, and light appeared, cf. v:Ge 1:5, v:Ge 1:8, v:Ge 1:13, v:Ge 1:19, v:Ge 1:23, v:Ge 1:31 (all P); also arise, come on the stage or scene, [[וְאַחֲרָיו הָיׇה שַׁמְגַּר]] Ju Jdg 3:31 and after him arose Shamgar (= [[וַיׇּקָם]] Jdg 10:1); further [[וַעֲלָטָה הָיׇה]] Ge 15:17 (JE) and darkness came on; [[הַבּׂקֶר הָיׇה]] Ex 10:13 (J) the morning came, Ex 19:16 (E); [[וַיְהִי הַיּוֹם]] † 1Sa 1:4 and the day came, when (v. Dr), 1Sa 14:1, 2Ki 4:8, 2Ki 4:11, 2Ki 4:18, Job 1:6, Job 1:18, Job 2:1.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. prep.: [[בְּ]], [[וְיׇדֵנוּ אַל־תְּהִי־בוֹ]] Ge 37:27 (J) but our hand, let it not come upon him, of hand of ´[[יּ]] 1Sa 5:9, 1Sa 7:13, 1Sa 12:15 + (all in hostile sense); [[בְּכָל־־ֲשֶׁר יֶשׁ־לוֹ]] ´[[וַיְהִי בִּרְכַּת י]] Ge 39:5 (J) and the blessing of ´[[י]] came into (on) all that he had; but also of plague Ex 12:13 (P); sq. [[עַל]], [[וּמֵי הַמַּבּוּל הָיוּ עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 7:10 (J) that the waters of the flood came upon the earth; [[עָלַי הָיוּ כֻלָָּנׇה]] Ge 42:36 (E) Ge 9:2 (P) fear shall come upon, cf. Ge 35:25 (P) 2Ch 14:13, 2Ch 17:19, 2Ch 20:29 +; of wrath Jos 22:20, 1Ki 3:27; so of Saul's evil spirit fr. God 1Sa 16:16, 1Sa 16:23, 1Sa 19:9 ([[אֶל]]); but sq. [[עַל]] also in good sense ´[[וַתְּהִי עָלָיו רוּחַ י]] conferring strength & efficiency Ju Jdg 3:10, Jdg 11:29 ([[היה]] = [[חלח]] Ju Jdg 14:6 + oft.), cf. Nu 24:2 (JE) of prophetic power; (on ´[[וַתְּהִי לָיו יַד י]] 2Ki 3:15, Ez Eze 3:22 and the like, vid. [[יׇד]]); [[יַד אֱלֽהֵינוּ הָֽיְתָה עָלֵינוּ]] Ezr 8:31, so Ps 80:18; even [[וַתְּהִי עַל־ראׁשׁ דָּוִד]] 2Sa 12:30 and it (the crown, [[עֲטֶרֶת]]) came (i.e. was put, set) on David's head; with a diff. mng. [[וַנִּהְיֶה עֲלֵיהֶם עַד־פֶּתַח]] [[הַשָָּׁעַר]] 2Sa 11:23 and we were close upon them even to the gateway (cf. We Dr); come, go, follow (sq. [[אַחֲרַי]]) i.e. take the side of, adhere to, Ex 23:2 (JE) 1Sa 12:14, 2Sa 2:10, 1Ki 12:20, 1Ki 16:21; sq. [[לְ]] of blessings Ge 49:26 (poem); of judgement, punishment Je 40:3 esp. [[אֶל]]…[[ויהי דבר]] and the word of … came unto: word of Samuel 1Sa 4:1; usually word of God (or ´[[י]]) Ge 15:1, 1Sa 15:10 + ; constantly in prophets: Ho 1:1, Mic 1:1 etc.; esp. Je & Ez: Je 1:4, Je 1:11, Je 1:13, Je 2:1, Je 13:8 +; Ez Eze 3:16, Eze 6:1, Eze 7:1, Eze 11:14, Eze 11:17, Eze 11:21, Eze 11:26, Eze 12:1, Eze 12:8 +; so also abs. [[הָיׇה הַמַּשָּׂא הַזֶּה]] Is 14:28 in the death-year of king Ahaz came this utterance; also sq. [[מִן]]; [[מַלְכֵי עַמִּין מִמֶּנׇּה יִהְיוּ]] Ge 17:16 (P), [[וּקְהַל גּוֹיִם יִהְיֶה מִמֶָּךָּ]] Ge 35:11 (P), [[וְהָיׇה אַדִּירוֹ]] [[מִמֶּנּוּ]] Je 30:21 (‖[[מִקִּרְבּוֹ יֵחֵא]]); [[הַכּׂל הָיׇה מִן־הֶעָפָר]] [[וְהַכּׂל שָׁב אֶל הֶעָפָר]] Ec 3:20 all came from the dust, & all return unto the dust; [[וַיְהִי קֶחֶף גׇּדוֹל מֵאֵת]] [[חְבָאוֹת]] ´[[י]] Zec 7:12.
become :

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. pred. noun (to be viewed as implicit accus. Dr:§ 161, 3 n., according to the Arab. usage W:AG ii, § 41. 44. 74): [[הִוא הָֽיְתָה אֵם כָּל־חָָי]] Ge 3:20 (J) it was she that became the mother of all living; [[וַיְהִי הֶבֶל]] [[רׂעֵה חאׁן וְקַיִן הָיׇה עׂבֵד אֲדָמָה]]Ge 4:2 (J) and Abel became a shepherd of flocks, while Cain became a tiller of ground; 2Sa 8:14, Mic 2:11 + oft.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. pred. adj. Ge 38:7, Ex 36:13 +; cf. Ge 37:20 let us see what his dream will become (turn out to be, signify);

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: become like ([[כְּ]]), [[וִהְיִיתֶם כֵּאלֽהִים]] Ge 3:5 and ye shall become like gods cf. v:Ge 3:22, Nu 11:1 (JE), Ho 2:1, Ho 7:11, Is 9:18, 1Ki 7:8, Zec 9:7 +; cf. Ge 15:5 so ([[כּׂה]]) shall thy seed become; specif. of likeness in punishment Is 1:9, 1Sa 17:36 +; also with [[כְּ]] repeated [[וְהָיׇה כָעָם כַּכּׂהֵן]] Ho 4:9 and the people shall become like the priest (lit., and the like of the people shall become the like of the priest), so esp. Is 24:2 (6 pairs of words as above); [[וְהָיׇה]] [[כַצַּדִּיק כָּרָשָׁע]] Ge 18:25 (J), v. [[כְּ]].

definitions.title: c
definitions.body: Ge 27:32 his hands had become like the hands of Esau his brother, hairy.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: sq. pred. + [[לְ]] pers. [[וּתְהִי]] [[אִשָּׁה לְבֶן־אֲדׂנֶיךָ]] Ge 24:51 (J) and let her become wife to the son of thy lord, 1Sa 16:21, 1Ki 11:25, Ps 89:42, 1Ch 18:6 +; = be instituted, estanblished, [[וְהָיׇה]] [[לָהֶסחָק־עוֹלָם]] Ex 30:21 (P) and it shall be established for them as a perpetual ordinance (cf.

definitions.title: f
definitions.body: infr.).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: sq. [[לְ]] pred.: [[וַיְהִי הָאָדָם לְנֶפֶשׁ חַיׇּה]] Ge 2:7 (J) and the man became a living soul; [[וְהָיׇה לְאַרְבָּעָה]] [[רָאשִׁים]]Ge 2:10 (J) and it became four heads; [[יִהְיֶה־לְעָם]] Ge 48:19 (J) he too shall become a people; [[וִהְיוּ לַאֲנׇשִׁים]] 1Sa 4:9 and become (shew yourselves to be) men (‖[[הִתְחַזְּקוּ]]; cf. with double [[לְ]],

definitions.title: f
definitions.body: infr.); Zep 1:13, Ez Eze 17:6, Eze 47:12, Job 16:8; [[עלמֶלֶךְ עַל־כָּל־הָאָרֶץ]] ´[[וְהָיׇה י]] Zec 14:9; [[וַיְהִי לְמַס עׂבֵד]] † Ge 49:15, Jos 16:10; so oft.; also in sense of turn into, be changed so as to become, [[וַיְהִי]] [[לְנׇחָשׁ]]Ex 4:3 and it became a serpent, v:Ex 4:4, Ex 7:10, Is 1:22, De 26:5 +; fig. [[וַיְהִי לְמָָיִם]] Jos 7:5 and it (their heart) turned to water, so [[וְהוּא הָיׇה לְאֶבֶן]] 1Sa 25:37; or, serve as [[וְהָיוּ לִמְאוֹרׂת]] Ge 1:15 (P) and they shall become (fulfil the function of, serve as) luminaries, cf. v:Ge 1:14; [[וְהָיׇה לְאוֹת בְּרִית]] Ge 9:13, Ge 17:11 (both P).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: oft. c. definitions.title: III.
definitions.body: Be (often with subordinate idea of becoming) ;—

exist, be in existence (i.e. orig. have come into existence), [[כָּל־הַיּמִים אֲשֶׁר הָיׇה]] 1Sa 1:28 all the days which he shall have been (lived, = [[חַי]] Ge 5:5 etc., Dr:Sm), Job 3:16, Is 23:13; oft. c. [[בְּ]] loc. [[וְכׂל שִׂיחַ הַשָּׂדֶה טֶרֶם יִהְיֶה בָאָרץ]] Ge 2:5 (J) and there was not yet in the earth any shrub of the field; ´[[וּבְאֵלֶּה לאׁ הָיׇה אִישׁ וגו]] Nu 26:64 (P) and among them there was not a man to be found, etc.; also [[וְלאׁ הָיׇה כַּיּוֹם הַהוּא לְפָנׇיו וְאַחֲרָיו]] Jos 10:14 (JE) & there hath not been a day like that before it nor since. cf. 2Sa 14:25, 1Ki 18:5, 1Ki 21:25, 1Ki 23:25, Ne 13:26 +; somewhat weaker, in the freq. introductory clause [[וַיְהִי אִישׁ]] now there was a man Ju Jdg 13:2, 1Sa 1:1, 1Sa 9:1, Nu 9:6 (P), Job 1:1 +; on [[אֶהְיֶה אֲשֶׁר אֶהְיֶה]] Ex 3:14 v. [[יהוֹה]].

abide, remain, continue (with word of place or time) [[וַיְהִי משֶׁה בָּהָר]] Ex 24:18 and Moses remainded in the mount forty days, etc., so Ex 34:28 (both JE), Ju Jdg 17:4, Jdg 17:12, 1Sa 6:1, 1Ki 11:20, 2Ki 11:3 = 2Ch 22:12 +; also Le 22:27, Le 25:28 (both H), etc.; sq. [[עַד]] temp. remain until De 22:2, 1Ki 11:40, 2Ki 15:5, 2Ch 5:9, 2Ch 26:21, Da 1:21 etc.; cf. [[הוּא יִהְיֶה לְעוֹלָם]] Ec 3:14; so also of space sq. [[עַד]] extend unto, as far as, Jos 19:10: of net beneath altar, Ex 27:5 shall reach as far as ([[עַד]]) the middle of the altar.

with word of locality, be in or at a place, be situated stand, lie; [[בִּהְיוֹתָם בַּשָּׂדֶה]] Ge 4:8 (J) when they were in the field, [[הַמָּקוֹם אֲשֶׁר־הָיׇה שָׁם אָהֳלֽה בַּתְּחִלָּה]] Ge 13:3 (J) the place where his tent had stood at first; [[וְהָאָרֶץ תִּהְיֶה לִפְנֵיכֶם]] Ge 34:10 and the land, it lieth before you; cf. Jos 19:1, Ju Jdg 7:1, Jdg 7:8, Mic 5:6, Mic 5:7; sq. [[עַל]] be, be found or situated upon Is 30:25 and there shall be upon every high mountain etc., streams, water-courses; Ez Eze 37:27 and my dwelling-place shall be over them; fig. of guilt [[דָּמִים וְהָיׇה עָלָיךָ]] De 19:10 and blood (-guilt) be upon thee.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sq. pred. adj. [[וַיִּהְיוּ שְׁנֵיהֶם עֲרוּמִּים]] Ge 2:25, [[וְהַנָּחָשׁ הָיׇה]] [[עָרוּם]] Ge 3:1, [[בִּהְיוֹתָם כּׂאֲבִים]] Ge 34:25, [[וַיְהִי יוֹסֵף יְפֵה־תׂאַר]] Ge 39:6; De 23:15, Jos 19:9, Ju Jdg 11:1, Job 1:1, Job 1:3, 2Ch 7:21.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. pred. noun Ge 1:2, Ge 9:18, Ge 25:3, Ge 36:14, Ge 40:13, 1Sa 17:34, 1Sa 17:42, 2Sa 8:10, 2Sa 20:25, 1Ki 10:6, 2Ki 3:4, 2Ki 5:1, 2Ki 5:1, 1Ch 9:20, 1Ch 11:20, 1Ch 18:10, 1Ch 26:10, 2Ch 13:7; [[כִּי לאׁ־הָיׇה מֶלֶח יִשְׂרָאֵל]] 2Ch 18:32 (‖ 1Ki 22:33 [[כִּי־לאׁ־מֶלֶח ישׂראל הוּא]]) + ; oft. of age: [[וַיְהִי אַבְרָם בֶּן־תִּשְׁעִים שָׁנׇה וְתֵשַׁע שָׁנִים]] Ge 17:1 (P) 2Ki 8:17, 2Ki 14:2, 2Ki 15:2, 2Ki 15:33, 2Ki 18:2, 2Ch 21:20, 2Ch 27:8 +; sq. pred. Inf. abs. (very anomal.) [[וְהַמַּיִם הָיוּ הָיוּ הָלוֹח וְחָסוֹר]] Ge 8:5; = amount to, come to, in enum. of days of life number of people, amounts of money, etc.: Ge 5:4, Ge 5:5, Ge 5:8, Ge 5:11, Ge 5:14, Ge 9:29, Ge 11:32, Ge 23:1 +; Ex 38:24, Nu 1:46, etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: sq. adv. & adverbial phr.: [[לאׁ־טוֹב הֱיוֹת הָאָדָם]] [[לְבַדּוֹ]]Ge 2:18 (J) it is not good that the man be alone; [[חָדַל לִהְיוֹת לְשָׂרָה אׂרַה כַּנָּשִׁים]] Ge 18:11 (J).

definitions.body: [[היה]] + pt., of continuous state, or condition, sts., esp. late (cf. NH), of habit, c. [[וַיְהִי]] also of beginning and continuance (cf. Dr:§ 135, (5)): pt. act. Ge 39:22 (J), Ex 3:1 (E), 1Sa 2:11, 1Sa 7:10, 1Sa 18:9 (cf. Dr) v:1Sa 18:14, v:1Sa 18:29, 2Sa 8:15 = 1Ch 18:14. De 28:29, Is 30:20, 1Ki 5:1, 1Ki 5:15, 1Ki 5:24, 2Ki 6:5, 2Ki 9:14, 2Ch 9:26, Ezr 4:4, Ne 1:4, Ne 2:13, Da 1:16 +; Ge 1:6 (P); ´[[הָיׇה יׇרֵא אֶת־י]] 1Ki 18:3, 2Ki 4:1, 2Ch 26:1; pt. pass. Jos 10:26, 1Ki 13:24, 1Ki 22:35 [[וְהַמֶּלֶח הָיׇה מָעֳמָד]] [[בַּמֶּרְכָּבָה]](‖ 2Ch 18:34 [[הָיׇה מַעֲמִיד]]), Is 2:2 = Mic 4:1, [[וְהָיׇה סָגוּר]] Ez Eze 44:2, [[נַעֲשֶׂה]] ´[[ה]] Ne 5:18, ´[[וְאָהוּב לֵאלֽהָיו ה]] Ne 13:26; —on 2Sa 13:32 cf. Dr.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: sq. Inf. c. [[לְ]] (Dr:§ 208, 204): [[וְהָיׇה לְבָעֵר]] Is 5:5 and it shall be to burn (is to be, is destined to be burned) etc.; [[וַיְהִי הַשֶּׁמֶשׁ]] [[לָבוֹא]] Ge 15:12 and the sun was about to set; [[וַיְהִי]] [[הַשַּׁעַר לִסְגּוֹר]]Jos 2:5 and the gate was about to be shut; but also [[וַיְהִי לִדְרשׁ אֱלֽהִים]] 2Ch 26:5 (nearlly = [[וַוְהִי]] + Pt.) †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִהְיׇה]] 1Ki 1:27 + 6 t. + Mic 2:4 (cf. infr. ad fin.); 3 fs. [[נִהָיְתָה]] Ju Jdg 19:30 + 5 t., [[נִהְיׇתָָה]] Ex 11:6, Je 48:19, [[וְהְיׇ֑תָה]] consec. Ez Eze 39:8 + Eze 21:12 (del. B Codd LXX Co); 2 ms. [[נִהְיֵיתָ]] De 27:9; 1 s. [[נִהְיֵיתִי]] Da 8:27; Pt. fs. [[נִהְיׇה]] Pr 13:19; —

either, be done, be brought about, or occur, come to pass: in the strong expressions [[אֲשֶׁר כָּמׂהוּ]] [[וְכָמׂהוּ לאׁ תׂסִף]] ´[[לאׁ נ]] Ex 11:6 (J) a cry such as hath not occurred (been raised), and will not be again, cf. De 4:32 (be done; ‖[[נִשְׁמַע]]), & Ju Jdg 19:30 (‖[[נִרְאֲתָה]]);—but simply intrans. Joe 2:2, Da 12:1 & appar. Ez Eze 21:12 (‖[[בָּאָ֫ה]]; on txt., however, v. supr.) Eze 39:8 (‖ id.);—also [[אֵיכָה נִהְיְתָה הָרָעָה הַזּאׁת]] Ju Jdg 20:3 how hath this wickedness been done ? cf. v:Jdg 20:12, Je 5:30, Je 48:19 also Ne 6:8; c. [[לאׁ]], existence denied ´[[לאׁ נ]] Zec 8:10 (‖[[אֵינֶ֑נׇּה]]); in all the above (exc. Joe 2:2, Da 12:1 & Ez Eze 21:12, Eze 39:8) personal agency is clearly implied; it is expressed ´[[מֵאֵת אֲדׂנִי הַמֶּלֶח נ]] [[הַדָּבָר הַזֶּה]] 1Ki 1:27, so of divine agency ([[מֵאִתִּי]]) 1Ki 12:24 = 2Ch 11:4; further be attained, secured, of wages Zec 8:10 (c. [[לאׁ]], ‖[[אֵינֶנׇּ֑ה]]); [[תַּאֲוׇּה נִהְיׇה]] Pr 13:19 a desire come to pass, realized.

be done, finished, gone, only Dn [[וּשְׁנׇתוֹ נִהְיְתָה עָלָיו]] Da 2:1 and his sleep was finished upon him, i.e. left him (cf. Aram. Da 6:19); [[נִהְיֵיתִי]] Da 8:27 I came to an end, was exhausted (si vera l., del. LXX; ‖[[נֶחֱלֵיתִי]]); [[נִהְיָה]], in [[וְנׇהָה נִהְיׇה]] Mic 2:4, is dub.; it is done, over, the ruin is come RobGes Ew Hi Ca Che LRVm;? < om. as dittogr. Sta:ZAW 1886, 122 f. cf. JBL:1890, 74.77.
